name: Bedtime Adventures
description:
Sex is boring, adventuring is fun! Join Monday and Corduroy in their ace-tastic nightly adventures and discover a new world filled with surprises. A short but funny looping game with four possible adventures, and a bonus scene if you finish all four!

Made for Ace Jam 2023

Credits:

  • LaChapeliere: narrative designer
  • Transitoriii: writer & narrative designer
  • WynnArt: art (characters & props)
  • Max Morkson: art (backgrounds&dragon) & coding

Audio credits:

"Valse Gymnopedie", "Adventures in Adventureland", "New Hero in Town", "Pleasant Porridge", "Neon Laser Horizon", "Late Night Radio" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
